text:
Antipsychotics and THC: A Comprehensive Review

Abstract The use of antipsychotics in conjunction with tetrahydrocannabinol

(THC), a psychoactive compound found in cannabis, has been a topic of

interest in recent years. This report aims to provide an in-depth review of the

current literature on this subject, exploring the potential interactions and

effects of combining these substances.
